name: Spectral Knight: The Search for the Soulshards
name_original: Spectral Knight: The Search for the Soulshards
description:
Rising from an ethereal grave, a knight begins his journey back to the land of the living to exact justice upon the sorceress who split his soul. Navigate through haunted forests, long-lost ruins and still-standing catacombs of ages past, as you join the Spectral Knight in a quest for justice and revenge! And time those jumps!

Built Unity scenes using in-store assets, attributed levels with music and some sound effects, established narrative with theme or paranormal.
